jcr:root.jcr:description: I am so sick of all these endless discussions about shapes and squares and spheres. I give up and sell my stuff. And to everyone here in the forum: wake up and get a life. There are things beyond geometry.
jcr:root.jcr:title: I am selling my GeoShapes collection
